last_episode_to_air.name: Family Crisis: Florida Fairwell
last_episode_to_air.overview: A trip to Florida for a final goodbye to Anna turns messy; Jessica asks a favor from Pumpkin.

name: Mama June: Family Crisis
overview: June Shannon ('Mama June') gained fame as the mother of young beauty-pageant contestant 'Honey Boo Boo' (Alana Thompson) on various reality shows. With that notoriety came jokes from comedians and people on social media about her weight. Ending her marriage to Sugar Bear and facing health issues, Mama June wants to slim down so she can start a new life with a new body and, she hopes, a new love.
tagline: There's a smokin' hot mama waiting to bust out!

episodes.name: Thin-tervention
episodes.overview: Mama June is blindsided by Sugar Bear’s shocking engagement. And when a revenge diet fails and a hot date bails, June considers major surgery! The most dramatic total body transformation ever begins…

episodes.name: Operation Tummy Boo Boo
episodes.overview: Mama June goes under the knife for her total body transformation. Disaster strikes when June drives blind on a blind date! When she cheats on her new workout program, June gets ambushed!

episodes.name: Here Comes the Bridezilla
episodes.overview: Mama June reveals shocking results with the help of new trainer, Kenya; Alana keeps a big secret from Mama; June finally meets Sugar Bear's fiancé.

episodes.name: Let Boo Boo Eat Cake
episodes.overview: Sugar Bear's fiancé Jennifer sabotages June's weight loss progress; June goes on a date with a jerk.

episodes.name: Mama Frankenstein
episodes.overview: Mama June must drop 15 pounds in two weeks! When her junk food stash is exposed, June has a meltdown and is pushed over the edge. Alana and Pumpkin vow to save her, even if it means they must diet too!

episodes.name: Mama June's Big Reveal
episodes.overview: A surprise ambush gets June back on track! Jennifer drops a wedding bomb. At the final photo shoot reveal, Mama June is unrecognizable!

episodes.name: Red Hot Mama
episodes.overview: In the Season 1 finale, Sugar Bear re-invites June to his wedding; and Jennifer goes ballistic. Later, the big day descends into chaos, as tornado warnings and June's arrival catch everyone by surprise; and June's health takes a sudden turn.

episodes.name: Too Big For TV
episodes.overview: Mama June along with cast and crew go behind-the-scenes and reveal the biggest secrets, outtakes and exclusives from this season! And then, June and Jennifer face off for the first time since the wedding. A surprise bombshell sparks chaos. Sugar Bear unleashes rage in a shocking outburst.

episodes.name: Mama's Big Fat Secret
episodes.overview: Honey Boo Boo wants Mama June to enter a beauty pageant, but June is focused on her new mystery man.

episodes.name: A Pumpkin in the Oven
episodes.overview: Mama is shocked by an unplanned pregnancy; Alana convinces June to train for a beauty pageant.

episodes.name: Go-Go Juice Gonna Make Mama Win
episodes.overview: We don't have a summary for Go-Go Juice Gonna Make Mama Win yet. Hang in there, or go ahead and contribute one.

episodes.name: Boo Boo...You're Fired!
episodes.overview: Coach Honey Boo Boo is blindsided when Mama hires a new coach. Feeling neglected, Alana runs away! Jennifer plots to get a DNA test. Pumpkin secretly moves Josh into the house without Mama’s permission.

episodes.name: Project Runaway
episodes.overview: Alana runs away to Sugar Bear's house; Mama blows up when Josh's antics go too far; Pumpkin moves out; Jennifer spies on June's boyfriend; June faces a health emergency.

episodes.name: Blind-Sided
episodes.overview: June is rushed to the hospital to save her eyesight; a pregnant Pumpkin has a breakdown; Jennifer finally receives the DNA results.

episodes.name: All Eyes On Mama
episodes.overview: Panic strikes after June's eye surgery fails; Alana brings Sugar Bear to yoga to work on his temper, but he blows up after finding the hidden DNA results; Mama has a breakdown at Pumpkin's ultrasound.

episodes.name: Make Womb for Baby
episodes.overview: June undergoes another surgery to keep from going blind; Jennifer keeps a huge secret from Sugar Bear; Pumpkin goes into labor and June risks everything to be with her despite her doctor's orders.

episodes.name: New Baby in Town
episodes.overview: There’s a new baby in town, but also a sudden death in the family. June gains weight and can’t fit in her pageant dress. Sugar Bear is shocked when he finally learns Jennifer’s secret.

episodes.name: Is He the One?
episodes.overview: Alana’s disappointment over the pageant cancellation turns to excitement when Josh wants to propose to Pumpkin. Mama catches wedding fever and struggles with her weight gain. Jennifer gets gastric bypass surgery.

episodes.name: Honey Boo Boo Is Back!
episodes.overview: Honey Boo Boo joins Mama June in a new mother-daughter pageant; Alana calls on an old toddler pageant friend; Sugar Bear gets caught flirting with other plus-size women; June strips down for a lingerie shoot and has a sexy surprise for Geno.

episodes.name: Tater Totta & Forklift Freida
episodes.overview: June and Alana go head to head with their hardcore pageant coach who gives them mean nicknames; Josh makes a mess of Pumpkin's wedding plans; in mediation, Sugar Bear is blindsided when Alana demands to have her voice heard.

episodes.name: Mama's Big Proposal
episodes.overview: Tired of waiting for Geno to ask, June pops the question; Alana tells Sugar Bear how she really feels about him; Pumpkin and Josh try home therapy to solve their problems; June and Alana come face to face with their pageant rivals.

episodes.name: Five, six, seven, ate!
episodes.overview: June gets a big job offer in Vegas and secretly plans a double wedding; Alana busts Geno for his response to Mama's proposal; Sugar Bear ruins visitation with Alana; panic strikes when a pageant dance class runs amok; Mama stress eats.

episodes.name: Say Yes to the Pageant Dress
episodes.overview: Mean girls ambush June and Alana's pageant dress shopping; Mama's stress eating leads her to a shocking new dress size; Sugar Bear fights to see Alana; Jennifer devises a plan to get revenge on June for ambushing her wedding.

episodes.name: Worst Day in Pageantry
episodes.overview: June is shocked when she finds out how much she weighs. All hell breaks loose when June catches Geno on the phone with Jennifer. The morning of the pageant arrives and Alana makes an unexpected decision.

episodes.name: Stage Fright & Pageant Fight
episodes.overview: As show time approaches at the pageant, a frightening emergency sends Alana running for a medic; Mama struggles to squeeze into her pageant dress; Jennifer shows up looking for revenge; panic strikes when the curtains open.

episodes.name: And the Pageant Winners Are...
episodes.overview: A mother-daughter pageant duo is crowned, but an unexpected announcement shocks everyone; the family heads to Las Vegas where Pumpkin and Josh get pre-wedding jitters; June is blind-sided by surprise guests; Geno reveals his true feelings for June.

episodes.name: The Vegas Hillbillies
episodes.overview: In Las Vegas, June is distracted at press event after Geno ditches her to go gambling with Jennifer; Pumpkin and Josh get married but things aren't happily-ever-after when Mama ambushes Geno with a surprise wedding.

episodes.name: Dance with the Stars
episodes.overview: Alana makes her Dancing with the Stars debut and develops a crush on her dance partner. Geno makes a grand gesture but unexpected pregnancy news puts all into question. Midway through her weight loss journey, Jennifer makes a stunning reveal.

episodes.name: From Not to Knocked Up
episodes.overview: Mama's secret pregnancy threatens both Alana's Hollywood career and her relationship with Geno; Jennifer contemplates more copycat surgery; Josh goes behind Pumpkin's back with a get-rich-quick scheme that is bound to backfire.

episodes.name: Geno 911
episodes.overview: Mama faces pregnancy trouble as Geno is hunted down by the police and arrested; Jennifer undergoes her first copycat skin removal surgery; Alana misses Hollywood and Tristan but may be locking lips with a new guy at the state fair.

episodes.name: Love After Lockup
episodes.overview: Geno is behind bars; Mama comes clean; Alana is shocked by internet comments about her appearance on "Dancing With the Stars: Juniors;" Jennifer ambushes June; Pumpkin doctors Josh's résumé.

episodes.name: Fit Farm Wars
episodes.overview: Rivals June and Jennifer slug it out at a fit farm, then they find out they'll be rooming together; Sugar Bear catches Geno doing something suspicious; Alana becomes an unpopular roommate after sabotaging Josh's first day of work.

episodes.name: Let Them Eat Fat Cake
episodes.overview: Infidelity rocks June and Geno's relationship; June and Jennifer leave the fat farm determined to beat each other in the weight-loss contest; Sugar Bear tattles on Geno; Alana struggles to reclaim her confidence.

episodes.name: Who Is Sexting Geno?
episodes.overview: June is heartbroken after discovering that Geno is "sexting" another woman; a psychic warns Pumpkin about Geno; Alana's return to showbiz is not what she expects; Sugar Bear gets Botox.

episodes.name: Geno's Free Ride
episodes.overview: When Geno ghosts June on a family road trip, June finally comes clean to Doe Doe about Geno's cheating; Alana crushes on Tristan but doesn't want to be friend-zoned; Jennifer discovers sexy photos of Sugar Bear taken by a man.

episodes.name: Mama's Breakdown
episodes.overview: June has a mental and physical breakdown due to Geno's cheating and the pressure of the magazine competition; when Geno taunts Mama about her problems, Pumpkin takes charge.

episodes.name: Losing Mama June
episodes.overview: June's despair over Geno leads to a psychotic break with reality and a meltdown; the family takes drastic measures to save her life, but it might be too late; after losing hundreds of pounds, Jennifer reveals a shocking transformation.

episodes.name: The Intervention
episodes.overview: June's breakdown leads the family to bring in professional help to save her life; things take a turn for the worse when June and Geno are arrested at an Alabama gas station; Pumpkin fights Sugar Bear for custody of Alana.

episodes.name: Family Crisis
episodes.overview: June goes missing after her arrest and a surprising homicide triggers a vicious manhunt to save her.

episodes.name: Where Is Mama June?
episodes.overview: Doe Doe and Big Mike go into dangerous territory when they retrace June's steps in Alabama. Pumpkin and Jennifer lock horns. Alana's tough audition.

episodes.name: The Stakeout
episodes.overview: Doe Doe and Big Mike stake out Mama June in Alabama and become concerned by what they find. Alana’s self-doubt threatens her first runway show.

episodes.name: Mama's Crash Landing
episodes.overview: Mama and Geno crash into the garage on their return home. Fears for Mama’s safety intensify. The family is embarrassed to see a publicly drunk and stumbling half-naked Geno.

episodes.name: Mama's Cry for Help
episodes.overview: Mama hits rock bottom and cries out for help. The family supports her getting treatment but things quickly spiral out of control. After her first day back at school, Alana acts out on social media and it’s a viral disaster.

episodes.name: Everything for Sale
episodes.overview: Everyone is shocked when Mama sells their possessions for cash; Alana hits a heart-wrenching breaking point and the family comes to her rescue; Jennifer goes on the warpath to get full custody of Alana.

episodes.name: Mama's Court Orders
episodes.overview: The drama continues when a hidden camera catches a shocking video of June and Geno’s sketchy behavior, right as their court case escalates. Meanwhile, Alana longs for home and Sugar Bear reveals his medical issue.

episodes.name: Toddlers And Terror
episodes.overview: The family needs a break from all the Mama June drama, and they’ll get just that when Ella enters her first pageant! Will she take home the crown?

episodes.name: Mama's Open House
episodes.overview: Jennifer goes on the warpath to get custody of Alana. Doe Doe and Amber rush over to June’s house, but nothing prepares them for what they find.

episodes.name: Mama's Coming
episodes.overview: The hunt for Mama comes to a head in a dramatic sit-down; the family is enraged when Jennifer and Sugar Bear file for custody of Alana.

episodes.name: Face Off With Mama
episodes.overview: Mama and Pumpkin face off in a dramatic and scary sit down, but neither are prepared for the results of Mama’s drug test. Alana discovers a secret the family has been hiding from her.

episodes.name: Mama's Last Chance
episodes.overview: Mama's last chance at recovery takes an unexpected turn; Doe Doe discovers something special in June's abandoned storage unit; and Jennifer goes to extremes to win full custody of Alana.

episodes.name: Road to Redemption: From Crisis To Recovery
episodes.overview: Mama claims to be sober as her family falls apart. Pumpkin guards Alana and Ella from seeing Mama while Geno's still in the picture. Pumpkin and Josh's marriage hits rock bottom. Mama's blindsided when her past comes back to haunt her.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Mama's Fighting Chance
episodes.overview: June and Geno are shook when forced to appear in court; June goes searching for the girls.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Mama's Last Resort
episodes.overview: Mama fights to get her girls back; Sugar Bear reconnects with Alana.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: The Reunion
episodes.overview: Pumpkin and Alana confront Mama for the first time in a year in a heart-wrenching reunion.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Confronting Geno
episodes.overview: Pumpkin faces off with Geno after he pops up on Ella's surprise visit with Mama.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: The Visit
episodes.overview: Pumpkin, Alana and Ella go down to Florida to visit Mama; Alana struggles to forgive Geno.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: Alana begs to stay longer in Florida with Mama; Josh struggles to hide Sugar Bear.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Mama's Lying
episodes.overview: Mama's caught lying about her and Geno facing major jail time; Alana shuts down.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Another Pumpkin In The Oven
episodes.overview: Pumpkin keeps a secret; Josh is forced to call in a favor; Alana's health issues worsen.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Ella's Birthday Blow Up
episodes.overview: Ella's third birthday party turns into a battleground; Alana makes a run for it.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Mama's Scared Straight!
episodes.overview: June's in denial about facing jail time; Mama's scared straight when ambushed by the police.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Mama's Verdict
episodes.overview: Mama and Geno's court date has finally come; Pumpkin struggles to take care of a full house.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Behind Closed Doors
episodes.overview: The family settles into a new house, and Pumpkin goes into labor with her second baby.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Moving On and Moving In
episodes.overview: June's been hiding from Geno for weeks, but finally tells him what she really thinks of him and their relationship. Mama shows up to Pumpkin's house and the girls are furious.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Return To the Big Time
episodes.overview: June and Alana go to LA to appear on a major TV show while Pumpkin deals with life at home.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Sugar Mama
episodes.overview: Alana is done with June; Pumpkin is skeptical of Alana's crush; June's boyfriend proposes.

episodes.name: Road to Redemption: Sweet 16 and Mama's Not Missed
episodes.overview: June crashes Alana's 16th birthday party with bad results; June and Alana both have boyfriends.

episodes.name: Road to Redemption: Sick and Tired
episodes.overview: June exposes everyone to COVID; the family is in turmoil and calls Dr. Ish; June considers moving.

episodes.name: Road to Redemption: Boundaries
episodes.overview: Dr. Ish helps the family with their June issues; June and Justin secretly move closer to the girls.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Too Little Too Late
episodes.overview: June wants Alana to live with her and her boyfriend, Justin; Pumpkin wants full custody of Alana.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: What Happens In Vegas
episodes.overview: Pumpkin asks June for custody of Alana; Pumpkin reveals a secret; Josh seeks child support.

episodes.name: Road To Redemption: Battle For Alana
episodes.overview: Pumpkin and Josh's custody of Alana derails and Sugar Bear is forced to get involved.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: June's Big Secrets
episodes.overview: Pumpkin finds out June moved to Alabama and assumes she is on drugs again.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Mama Vs Mama
episodes.overview: June finds out the cause of her headaches, but Justin's mom thinks she's on drugs.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Bridal Shower Showdown
episodes.overview: Josh helps Alana learn to drive so she won't end up spoiled like June.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Knock Down Drag Out
episodes.overview: June tries to reconnect with her daughters, they ignore her calls.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Meet And Not So Greet
episodes.overview: Pumpkin and June clash during a meet and greet that goes off the rails.

episodes.name: Family Crisis : No Forgiveness Given
episodes.overview: Pumpkin tells Justin that June has been lying to him; he starts to reconsider the wedding.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Mama's Last Chance
episodes.overview: June begs for help from Dr. Ish, who plans a therapy weekend for her.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Therapy Weekend
episodes.overview: June and the girls work on their relationship with Dr. Ish during the therapy weekend.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: If Josh Ain't Happy, Ain't Nobody Happy
episodes.overview: June commits to making amends with the girls; Pumpkin convinces Josh to let June see the kids.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: June-Zilla
episodes.overview: June's destination wedding brings everyone together, even Anna.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Wedding Vows & Caps And Gowns
episodes.overview: Alana graduates from high school but struggles with decisions about college; Anna starts chemo.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Reality Sets In
episodes.overview: Alana graduates from high school; Pumpkin fears Anna is still in denial about her diagnosis.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: School Daze
episodes.overview: With Alana's college acceptance deadline approaching, Pumpkin secretly enlists Jessica and Dralin.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: To Go Or Not To Go
Family Crisis: More Money, More Problems
episodes.overview: Alana makes a big decision about college that leads to an even bigger question she needs to ask June. Doe Doe makes a surprise pop up during June's hair appointment and confronts her. Pumpkin helps Alana plan her future.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Rocky Mountain High…Prices
episodes.overview: Alana asks June for help with college and receives a shocking response. Pumpkin and Josh plan a trip to Colorado to help Alana figure things out. Dralin receives some news regarding his legal problems.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: You Dirty Dog
episodes.overview: Alana's college preparation continues to stress her. An argument over money throws a family dinner into utter chaos. June's marriage and relationship with her girls is threatened by her secrets and dishonesty.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Hitting the Road
episodes.overview: Alana moves to Colorado for college; June plans a birthday trip with Justin; Pumpkin visits Alana.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Birthday Shenanigans
episodes.overview: Alana makes an unexpected trip home; Pumpkin digs up dirt on June to expose her lies.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: F Cancer
episodes.overview: Everyone is shocked by Anna's latest health update; Alana and Dralin get a court letter.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Coming To Terms
episodes.overview: June is shocked by Anna's plans for her daughter; Josh surprises Pumpkin.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: One Last Family Christmas
episodes.overview: Anna's health takes a turn for the worse and Alana questions dropping out of college.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Forever, Anna
episodes.overview: Anna's death impacts the entire family; June and Justin's marriage is strained; Pumpkin struggles.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Moving Forward
episodes.overview: A lawsuit filed against June could have an impact; Pumpkin tries her hand at a new career path.

episodes.name: Family Crisis: Florida Fairwell
episodes.overview: A trip to Florida for a final goodbye to Anna turns messy; Jessica asks a favor from Pumpkin.
